message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"to be called; to have as a name","sentence":"她叫小朋友。","image_prompt":"A young girl in an HSK1-friendly setting, pointing to herself while saying her name to a group of small children. The scene is bright and simple, suitable for an educational flashcard, drawn in a soft apocalypse animation style, with gentle lighting and subtle background destruction, but the girl and children are happy and not afraid. The girl's mouth is open as she introduces herself. No text in the image.","sentence_translation":"She is called little friend."}
